amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to clarify that this bill shall not be construed to affect the privacy of employees with respect to voters' lists provided to labor organizations by employers pursuant to elections directed by the Board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to clarify that this bill shall not be construed to affect the privacy of employees with respect to voters' lists provided to labor organizations by employers pursuant to elections directed by the Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wild amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 178 (Roll no. 44).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Wild.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wild amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 178 (Roll no. 44).

Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
